name: Jericho Cord of Scarlet
description:
Journey through the ancient city of Jericho during the time the Israelites were moving to reclaim the promised land! Play as Calev, one of the two spies sent to gather information about Jericho from the inside. Alongside Pinchas, you'll need to avoid guards and talk to the certain citizens of the town to gain the knowledge you need and, ultimately, the city's plans.

Controls:

Move forward - w or up arrow key

Turn left - a or left arrow key

Turn right - d or right arrow key

Jump - spacebar

Crouch - c

Walk/Slow down - Left shift

Return to title screen - m

Return to last checkpoint/cutscene area - b

Credits:

John Towner, Claire Bedard, Daniel Lively
